pages.text: These industrious little buggers continuously collect leaves from trees.$(br)The results of their work are also reflected in their products: If you harvest a full anthill that collected leaves of colored trees with a shovel, you get dye.
Even better, if you bribe them with $(thing)Vegetal$(), you can even salvage pure pigment.$(br2)$(br2)Shoutout to @MastroCaleb for this great mod!
The ants produce an almost silk-like material from $(thing)Jade Petals$().
